Html: Is there any way to improve performance on the Irony Core. A simple For (loop) took so much long time than c# does if we add some test on the evaluation methods.

no surprise it is slower than c# - it is interpreter, and quite primitive one. But primitive scripts in Irony samples for expression evaluator have decent performance IMHO, around 200ns per simple expression.
One thing - Irony, as it is now, does not provide For-loop AST node, so I guess you have your own implementation - are you sure it's not this custom code that is at fault?
Roman
